description: Sortis Holdings, Inc. intends to focus on investment in the fintech space. It also focuses on its brands in hotel and lodging, coffee, food and beverage, and beauty and wellness industries, as well as provides technology-enabled real estate lending products, private equity strategies, and advisory services. The company was formerly known as Merchants Bancorp and changed its name to Sortis Holdings, Inc. in July 2017. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Portland, Oregon.
